item.description:
l
Greater Boston John Birch Society's Annual Christmas Breakfast will feature several speakers including Brad Wyatt of C4L, Walter Reddy of Committees of Safety and Hal Shurtleff of The John Birch Society. Sam Blumenfeld will also give a short talk on his new book "The Homeschooling Revolution."

There will be plenty of books and other material on sale including many out of print book and reprints.

The cost includes a full breakfast buffet. Since we need to pay in full on December 3, we need a check made out to JBS Speakers Bureau and sent to Bill McNally 7 Blueberry Rd Windham, NH 03087 or call Hal Shurtleff 857-498-1309 with debit/credit card info.
item.how_to_find_us: We will b e using one of the function rooms
item.name: JBS Annual Christmas Breakfast
